task.title: Managing Media Assets
task.abstract: Staff users can store all media assets in the Media Collections tab within the Communities app.All file extensions must be lowercase.

taskbody.context: In order to upload a previously saved image from the desktop:

step.cmd: Navigate to the Media Collections tab in the Communities app and click New.
Enter the Collection Name and click Save. Click the New Media Asset button.
Enter the media asset's Title and Description.
Click Choose File and Upload the asset.

taskbody.result: Once the new media asset is successfully uploaded, navigate to the related Media Collection and select the Asset ID; the Path field identifies the asset's URL.
